Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraMail
Namespace: "urn:zimbraMail"
EnableSharedReminder SOAP Command

Enable/disable reminders for shared appointments/tasks on a mountpoint

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required false

EnableSharedReminderRequest

    <EnableSharedReminderRequest> ## EnableSharedReminderRequest
        <link id="{mountpoint-id}" [reminder="{show-reminders-flag} (0|1)"] /> ## SharedReminderMount
    </EnableSharedReminderRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <EnableSharedReminderRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/link Required (only 1) Specification for mountpoint
/link@id Required (only 1) Type:String
Mountpoint ID
/link@reminder Optional (0 or 1) Type:0|1
Set to enable (or unset to disable) reminders for shared appointments/tasks

EnableSharedReminderResponse

    <EnableSharedReminderResponse /> ## EnableSharedReminderResponse
